p: Within the articles examined the majority considered cognition (either the topic in general or through the view of cognitive framing) with 36% examining sensemaking and 8% managerial interpretation. Articles in each of these cognitive process categories were examined for the level of research, type of research, key theme of their research, core concept and the factors that affected each category. FigureÂ 3 highlights the relative numbers of articles coded to each category by level and type of research.
